price: Ka ìròyìn ẹni tí A fún ní àwọn āyah Wa fún wọn, tí ó yọra rẹ̀ sílẹ̀ níbi àwọn āyah náà.¹ Nítorí náà, Èṣù tẹ̀lé e lẹ́yìn. Ó sì wà nínú àwọn olùṣìnà.
arabic: وَٱتۡلُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ نَبَأَ ٱلَّذِيٓ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ ءَايَٰتِنَا فَٱنسَلَخَ مِنۡهَا فَأَتۡبَعَهُ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ فَكَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡغَاوِينَ
footnotes: 1. Ó pa ìmọ̀ tì bí ìgbà tí ejò bá bọ́ ìhọ rẹ̀ sílẹ̀.

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-ut'lu ʿalayhim naba-a alladhī ātaynāhu āyātinā fa-insalakha min'hā fa-atbaʿahu al-shayṭānu fakāna mina al-ghāwīna
